title: Medical school is now free for most students at this top university after a $1 billion donation

author: Phil ClarkeHill
title: Video: Deadly tornado rips through China’s Shandong province | CNN
description: Dramatic video shows a tornado sending debris into the air in China’s Shandong province on Friday. At least five people have died and at least 88 more have been injured, according to authorities.
content: Dramatic video shows a tornado sending debris into the air in China's Shandong province on Friday. At least five people have died and at least 88 more have been injured, according to authorities.

author: Rosa Flores
title: Aerial video shows shark that officials say attacked several people | CNN
description: At least four people encountered a shark as they took to the waters off South Padre Island, Texas on the 4th of July Independence Day holiday. CNN’s Rosa Flores reports.
content: At least four people encountered a shark as they took to the waters off South Padre Island, Texas on the 4th of July Independence Day holiday. CNN's Rosa Flores reports.
